code: import React,{useState}from"react";import'../styles/Auth.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(_ref){let{onLogin,goToSignup}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[showPassword,setShowPassword]=useState(false);function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();onLogin({email,password});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-background",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"auth-title",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,placeholder:"your@email.com"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"password-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:showPassword?"text":"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true,placeholder:"Enter password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"toggle",onClick:()=>setShowPassword(s=>!s),title:showPassword?"Hide":"Show",children:showPassword?"üôà":"üëÅÔ∏è"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"dreamy-btn",type:"submit",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-action",children:["Don't have an account?",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"auth-link",onClick:goToSignup,children:"Sign Up"})]})]})});}export default Login;
